docs.snippet: As daily fantasy sports become more popular, start-up companies like FanDuel and DraftKings are raising and spending millions in a battle for supremacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: As daily fantasy sports become more popular, start-up companies like FanDuel and DraftKings are raising and spending millions in a battle for supremacy.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir Sports Business column examines rapid rise of FanDuel and DraftKings, start-ups that specialize in daily fantasy sports; niche, in which competitions are concluded in single day, represents small but growing segment of fantasy sports industry, which boasts some 57 million participants; businesses are competing aggressively for users and for investment from large entities like Fox Sports and ESPN.

headline.main: FanDuel and DraftKings, Leaders in Daily Fantasy Sports, Are Quickly Gaining Clout
headline.print_headline: Stakes Are Rising Rapidly in the Daily Fantasy Industry

docs.snippet: Brazil's Congress passed a fiscal responsibility law for football clubs on Monday, slightly watering down one presented by the president in March but preserving enough of the original to satisfy the country's biggest players union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's Congress passed a fiscal responsibility law for football clubs on Monday, slightly watering down one presented by the president in March but preserving enough of the original to satisfy the country's biggest players union.

headline.main: Brazilian Congress Passes Financial Fair Play Law
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Congress Passes Financial Fair Play Law

docs.snippet: Laura Davies was inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame on Monday, even though she wasn't around to enjoy all of it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Laura Davies was inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame on Monday, even though she wasn't around to enjoy all of it.

headline.main: O'Meara, Davies Part of Class Inducted Into Hall
headline.print_headline: O'Meara, Davies Part of Class Inducted Into Hall

docs.snippet: The top-seeded Djokovic defeated Federer in the final for the second straight year, earning his third Wimbledon title and his ninth Grand Slam trophy....
docs.lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Djokovic defeated Federer in the final for the second straight year, earning his third Wimbledon title and his ninth Grand Slam trophy.
docs.abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column says that Novak Djokovic, who defeated Roger Federer in Wimbledon Tennis Tournament final for second consecutive year, has come a long way in the sport and deserves No 1 spot.

headline.main: Wimbledon Crowd Resists a Novak Djokovic Title. It’s Futile.
headline.print_headline: Crowd Resists a Djokovic Title. It’s Futile.
